posts.post_content:
Posted By: Russ Bright
For sale is one of my prized possessions. I lost my contract (downsizing) at work and it is time to sell as I might be unemployed for the next 6 months or more.

If you know me or my collection, you know I chose cards on their eye appeal. This Cobb is a beautiful example with some light creasing, but the corners are sharp with only minor gold flaking - Piedmont back

Scans on request

Price is shipped, Insurance extra and HEAVILY recommended 

I also have more T205 for sale if interested

cash/check/MO, paypal with 3% extra for fees

thanks!
Russ


ambrosia2@hotmail.com
